## ResponseTransformMiddleware class

Middleware that is used for adding support of response transform

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ResponseTransformMiddleware implements RestMiddleware 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [RestMiddleware](./rest.restmiddleware.md)
